scripts.publish-patch: npm run check && npm run build && grunt bump-only:patch && npm publish ./
scripts.publish-minor: npm run check && npm run build && grunt bump-only:minor && npm publish ./
scripts.publish-major: npm run check && npm run build && grunt bump-only:major && npm publish ./
scripts.publish-prerelease: npm run check && npm run build && grunt bump-only:prerelease && npm publish ./
scripts.build: rimraf lib\* && babel src --ignore test --optional runtime --out-dir lib
scripts.build-test: npm run build && rimraf test\* && babel src/test --optional runtime --out-dir test
scripts.test: npm run build-test && mocha --require scripts/mocha-bootload test/*.test.js
